actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reform the requirements and authorities of the Director of Construction and Facilities Management of the Department of Veterans Affairs and to reform the acquisition, procurement, logistics, leasing, and construction activities of the Department, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Veterans Affairs Acquisition Reform Act of 2025

titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Acquisition Reform Act of 2025
Department of Veterans Affairs Acquisition Reform Act of 2025

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reform the requirements and authorities of the Director of Construction and Facilities Management of the Department of Veterans Affairs and to reform the acquisition, procurement, logistics, leasing, and construction activities of the Department, and for other purposes.
